about_the_game:
Kingdoms of Age is a trading card game, which pits you against other kingdoms where you battle in the arena.

Each Realm boss starts with 30 health, each turn you gain an extra mana which means you can play better cards as the rounds go on. As you battle, you don't just have to defeat the boss, you have to defend from the enemy players cards which have been played.

To start with, there are cards from the realm, Aecegoth and from the realm, Sleoborus. Each realm has fighting cards, magic cards, boosters, auras, health giving cards etc. Some pre built decks contain mostly magic cards, some mostly attacking cards, and then we have the ability to create you're own decks.

There are four preset created decks to use, which you can edit. You can also create a number of your own decks from scratch using all available cards. All cards available can be used, there isn't any in app purchases or being forced to pay to get better cards.

There are also five different battle layouts to fight with, each giving a different variation to each battle.

THERE ARE NO IN APP PURCHASES FOR THIS GAME.
